# UIModalTransitionStyle.crossDissolve | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ UIKit ](/documentation/uikit)

-  UIModalTransitionStyle.crossDissolve 

Case# UIModalTransitionStyle.crossDissolve

iOSiPadOSMac CatalysttvOSvisionOS

```
case crossDissolve
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/uikit/uimodaltransitionstyle/crossdissolve#Discussion)

When the view controller is presented, the current view fades out while the new view fades in at the same time. On dismissal, a similar type of cross-fade is used to return to the original view.
